name: America Party
description: The America Party ($AMERICA) is the first America-themed political meme token launched on the Ethereum blockchain. It is a decentralized, community-led project inspired by the ideals of self-governance, freedom, and unity—without being affiliated with any real-world political entity. $AMERICA has no dev tax, no team wallets, and no VC involvement. The token aims to bring people together under a banner of shared values and humor, using memes and culture as tools for viral growth and digital identity. Built entirely by the people, for the people — this is a project about representation, community ownership, and the meme-powered spirit of America on-chain.
